Quote: It would be nice if your Avatar powers could be just a little more specific from time to time.
This coup must be swift and decisive. The Earth King and each of the five generals must be taken out simultaneously.
If I sense any disloyalty, any hesitation, any weakness at all, I will snuff it out.
Nice speech, Azula. It was pretty and poetic, but also scary in a good way.
I thought you were going to make that one guy pee his pants.

Many times I imagined myself here, at the threshold of the palace.  But I always thought I would be here as a conqueror. Instead, we are the Earth King's personal guests, here to serve him tea. Destiny is a funny thing.
Have you met the Dai Li? They're earthbenders, but they have a killer instinct that's so firebender. I just love it.
You're so dramatic. What? Are you going to challenge me to an Agni Kai?
I met him in the woods once and knocked him down. Then he gave me some tea and some very good advice.
Then we'll work together to fight Azula, and save Katara and Zuko.

You're a terrible person! You know that? Always following us! Hunting the Avatar! Trying to capture the world's last hope for peace! But what do you care? You're the Fire Lord's son. Spreading war and violence and hatred is in your blood!
We should split up. Aang, you go with Iroh to look for Katara and the angry jerk, no offense.
Toph thinks you give pretty good advice, and great tea!
Perfection and power are overrated. I think you were very wise to choose happiness and love.
Sometimes, life is like this dark tunnel. You can't always see the light at the end of the tunnel, but if you just keep moving, you will come to a better place.
What are you in time for, cutie?
Uh, I'm kinda involved with Suki.
Oooh, it's like we're dancing together!
Now comes the part where I double cross you. Dai Li, arrest the Fire Nation princess!

I can see your whole history in your eyes. You were born with nothing, so you've had to struggle, and connive, and claw your way to power. But true power, the divine right to rule, is something you're born with.
You've beaten me at my own game.
Don't flatter yourself! You were never even a player.

I used to think this scar marked me. The mark of the banished prince, cursed to chase the Avatar forever. But lately, I've realized I'm free to determine my own destiny, even if I'll never be free of my mark.

You're not the man you used to be, Zuko. You are stronger and wiser and freer than you have ever been. And now you have come to the crossroads of your destiny. It's time for you to choose. It's time for you to choose good.

I need you, Zuko. I've plotted every move of this day, this glorious day in Fire Nation history, and the only way we win is together. At the end of this day, you will have your honor back. You will have Father's love. You will have everything you want.
Zuko, I am begging you. Look into your heart and see what it is that you truly want.
Come on, it's easy. You just walk on your front paws instead of your rear ones.
I betrayed Uncle.
The Earth Kingdom ... has fallen.
